attributes.action: to take immediate steps to halt the extradition to the USA of Gary McKinnon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
a total lack of humanity and respect has been shown by alan johnson in completely ignoring expert medical evidence in the case of gary mcKinnon, who could have his case heard in the uk.
does the home secretary want blood on his hands! the prime minister must intervene. other mps have called for this case to be halted.

rejection.details: The Home Secretary does not have general discretion in this case. He can only stop extradition if he finds that McKinnon’s human rights would be breached.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
